sentences.en: He looks so sugary, repulsive, poisonous.
sentences.cn: 他看上去是如此甜言蜜语, 令人恶心;卑鄙狠毒.

sentences.en: He was utterly repulsive to her.
His brief sketch of the creature was repulsive.
sentences.cn: 他对来客的简短描绘足以令人反感.

sentences.en: It is hard to forget repulsive things.
sentences.cn: 不堪入目的景象往往难以忘怀.

sentences.en: It's repulsive to think we have to suffer that much.
sentences.cn: 想到我们竟要受那么多的苦就叫人厌恶.
很多人觉得鼻涕虫让人恶心。

sentences.en: Never shall I forget the repulsive sight that met my eye when I turned round.
sentences.cn: 我永远忘记不了当时回头看见那副令人厌恶的样子.

sentences.en: She found the idea deeply repulsive.
sentences.cn: 她发现这个想法很恶心.

sentences.en: The discovery of the repulsive, anti - gravitational force of dark energy is explained.
sentences.cn: 的丑恶, 发现 抗 暗能量的引力解释.

sentences.en: The repulsive force within the nucleus is enormous.
sentences.cn: 核子内部的斥力是巨大的。

sentences.en: The repulsive forces exerted by the protons loosen the structure of the nucleus.
sentences.cn: 质子施加的斥力使原子核的结构松弛.

sentences.en: The sight of him is repulsive to me.
sentences.cn: 我一看见他就十分反感.

sentences.en: What a thoroughly repulsive pair they were!
sentences.cn: 老头子怎看这一对儿,怎别扭!

sentences.en: What are those repulsive - looking birds of prey in the cage beside them?
sentences.cn: 在鹰旁边的笼子里关着的那些面目可憎的猛禽是什么?

sentences.en: You would not be able to understand why some people find it repulsive.
sentences.cn: 同时不能理解为什么有人一见章鱼就恶心.

trans.tran_cn: 令人厌恶的，相斥的，可憎的
trans.tran_en: extremely unpleas-ant, in a way that almost makes you feel sick
